duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and support the renewal quoting analyst team in creating and revising quotes to drive on-time renewals and compliance with company policies.
Establish and maintain a regular cadence with the team to ensure development, process improvements, and progression toward career goals.
Collaborate with sales and customer success teams to ensure accurate customer subscription and product data is captured for renewal quotes.
Identify and drive effectiveness improvements in renewal quoting processes and tools to reduce overall time spent on tasks.
Ensure achievement of on-time, accurate, and actionable renewal quote creation and revisions, and compliance with pricing policies and procedures.
Collaborate with adjacent functions to define roles, responsibilities, and streamline processes for renewal activities.
Assist in special projects related to the renewal quoting process and function.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree, or 5+ years' experience in an Operations, Product, or Specialists role within a B2B organization
